content: 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook 3 remaining chs counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in 2 remaining chs 4 dcs row 2 chain 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook 3 remaining chs counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in 2 remaining chs flip up block from row 1 slip_stitch into chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs in chain-3 space 8 dcs row 3 chain 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in 2 remaining chs flip up blocks from previous row *sl st into chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs in chain-3 space * repeat from *to* across 12 dcs repeat row 3 till blanket measures 36 on both sides part 2 - decrease & finish once your blanket reaches 36 on both sides you ll start the decrease to make the other half of the square decrease row 1 turn your entire work so the blocks are facing away from you see pic below slip_stitch across the next 2 dcs and into the chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs into the chain-3 space *slip_stitch into chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs into chain-3 space * repeat from *to* across decrease row 2 turn your entire work slip_stitch across the next 2 dcs and into the chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs into the chain-3 space *slip_stitch into chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs into the chain-3 space * repeat from *to* until you reach the two connected blocks that look squared off slip_stitch into chain-3 space decrease row 3 turn your entire work slip_stitch across the next 3 dcs and into the chain-3 space chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs into the chain-3 space *slip_stitch into chain-3 space ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 dcs into the chain-3 space * repeat from *to* until you reach the connected blocks that look squared off slip_stitch into chain-3 space repeat decrease row 3 until you reach the final corner final corner slip_stitch into the chain-3 space turn your work slip_stitch across the next 3 dcs and into the chain-3 space fasten_off and weave in ends
